comingle.rewrite

Class RewriteMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • comingle.rewrite.RewriteMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class RewriteMachine
extends java.lang.Thread
    The base class of a CoMingle runtime. This is the class that the generated codes of CoMingle Programs extends, containing base functionality of a CoMingle Runtime.
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam
